values.ctor:
<init>(out: OutputStream!)
            Creates a new output stream with a default decompressor and buffer size.

<init>(out: OutputStream!, infl: Inflater!)
            Creates a new output stream with the specified decompressor and a default buffer size.

<init>(out: OutputStream!, infl: Inflater!, bufLen: Int)
            Creates a new output stream with the specified decompressor and buffer size.

values.desc: Writes any remaining uncompressed data to the output stream and closes the underlying output stream.
Finishes writing uncompressed data to the output stream without closing the underlying stream.
Flushes this output stream, forcing any pending buffered output bytes to be written.
Writes a byte to the uncompressed output stream.

values.code: write(b: ByteArray!, off: Int, len: Int)
values.desc: Writes an array of bytes to the uncompressed output stream.
